description: This file initializes the React application by rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up the React rendering process and imports necessary dependencies including React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into a specific DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM within the created root.
